nodes.text: By the year 25,793 BBY., a female individual of the Sith species served as a sensor officer aboard the space station called Fury Station. She had a red skin, dark-gray hair, black eyes, and she wore a black eye patch over her left eye.

The unidentified sensor officer made her first in-universe appearance in the second issue of the Star Wars: Dawn of the Jedi series of comic books. The issue was published on March 21, 2012, and was written by John Ostrander and penciled by Jan Duursema.
